ref: 2492 *ēkāhika ʻ having interval of one day ʼ. 2. With -- kk -- . [ēkāhá -- m. ʻ ceremony lasting one day ʼ ŚBr., ʻ period of one day ʼ Pāṇ., Pa. ēkāha -- m., Pk. ēgāha -- m.n.: ḗka -- , áhar -- ]
Pa. ēkāhika -- ʻ lasting one day ʼ,
Pk. ēgāhiya -- ʻ risen in one day, having an interval of one day (of fever) ʼ.
